name: The Avoider
storyline: You're The Ship, and you need to avoid asteroids. But be careful! If you crash on asteroid, you will need to start over!
summary: You need to avoid asteroids and score points. Every 10 seconds asteroids will grow, so you need to be careful. If you crash on it, game starts over. The game also has a high score system, which is not erased when it is restarted.
